Title: The Mommy Macaw
Plot: A young Macaw and his baby egg brother or sister are in trouble!  Their tucked safely into their nest, but their mommy is nowhere to be found.  Diego goes on a search to find their mommy, and finds her stuck and unable to get out on her own.  After he rescues her, he has to find a way to treat her so they can make their trip back to the nest before her little egg hatches.
Writer: Ligiah Villalobos, Valerie Walsh, Chris Gifford
